                         java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,

        slf4j does not provide the functionality to reset the logger. Here we have the missing implementation

        Returns:

      • getClasspathElements

        public java.util.List<java.io.File> getClasspathElements​()
        Get a list of unique elements on the classpath (directories and files) as File objects, preserving order. Classpath elements that do not exist are not included in the list.
